title: node frequently rewinds towards zero when syncmode is snap
body:
#### System information

Geth version: go version go1.17 darwin/amd64
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX

#### Expected behaviour

snapsync works 

#### Actual behaviour

snapsync keeps rewinding frequently, stuck with no progress

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


When I run a node in snap mode, peers report `EOF` frequently, and sync status is rewinded towards zero after a while, basically stuck with no progress, you can try it with this code: https://github.com/QuarkChain/go-ethereum/tree/tm_w3q

run with:

```
make geth

./build/bin/geth --web3q_galileo --syncmode snap --verbosity 4
```

It works fine if syncmode is full.

Sorry, but you can't honestly expect us to debug a modified fork of go-ethereum. The only ever version of go-ethereum that we support is the upstream master branch. Anything that diverges from that or anything older than that and you're on your own.
